name: The Eggventure (Raion Community)
description:
YOU CONTROL THE ENVIRONMENT, NOT THE PLAYER

Game Mechanic:

  • Mouse left click : Choose platform
  • W : Move platform up
  • A : Move platform left
  • S : Move platform down
  • D : Move platform right

Made By:

  1. Muhammad Haikal Fisabilillah (designer)
  2. Muhammad Firmansyah Putra (programmer)
  3. Aldino Titteo Rikardo (artist)
